Job Description: As Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) you are required to showcase immense knowledge in testing practices and in product development associated with test automation devOps      Basic Qualifications requirements :       3+ Years of experience as developer or SDET      Experience in building scalable test automation frameworks      Experience in building test automation frameworks for high availability applications      API level testing automation      Strong, object-oriented design and coding skills.      Experience with distributed (multi-tiered) systems, algorithms, and relational databases.      Experience in AWS both managing and setting up infrastructure for test automation applications or for production level applications      Strong knowledge in performance testing load provisioning      Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills and an ability to come up with creative solutions to impossible-to-solve problems.      Experience in web application and device test automation using Selenium, Robotium, Appium or any equivalent tool/s      Experience working no-sql DBs      Basic knowledge on js other web application development frameworks      Experience working on dockers and Kubernetes and have very good understanding on the containerisation concept.      Understanding on message queues related concepts      Understanding of QA methodologies, life cycle and processes.      Shows creativity and initiative to improve product coverage and effectiveness.       Education   : BE, B.Tech or any equivalent technical education
